b100.description: 18x8 Satin black replicas of BMW's 666m wheels designed to fit BMW 3 series 2006 to 2018.

extra_info.title: CENTER BORE: 72.6MM
extra_info.description: Factory fit and will require no center bore rings

extra_info.title: COLOR: SATIN BLACK
extra_info.description: Smooth satin black finish that shines just the right amount

extra_info.title: OFFSET: 35
extra_info.description: Factory recommended offset for 18x8 inch rims

extra_info.title: BOLT PATTERN: 5X120
extra_info.description: OEM bolt pattern, the same as all BMWs

extra_info.title: MATERIAL & WEIGHT: ALUMINUM 10KG PER RIM
extra_info.description: Made of light aluminum that can sustain track use
